channel.title: 508 slayer help ;)
channel.description: hi guys i got a 508 davidscape source .. and i need help ;) how do i change/add slayertasks ... i mean npc's to kill to gain slayer experience;) ? and how do i do so you first can get abyssal demon task when you'r 85 slayer ;) i would be happy if anyone could help me ;)

item.title: 508 slayer help ;)

item.description:

hi guys i got a 508 davidscape source … and i need help
how do i change/add slayertasks … i mean npc’s to kill to gain slayer experience;) ?
